titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the memorial park on Hero Street USA, in Silvis, Illinois, should be recognized as Hero Street Memorial Park and should continue to be supported as a park by the Town of Silvis at no cost to United States taxpayers.

A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the memorial park on Hero Street USA, in Silvis, Illinois, should be recognized as Hero Street Memorial Park and should continue to be supported as a park by the Town of Silvis at no cost to United States taxpayers.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the memorial park on Hero Street USA in Silvis, Illinois, should be recognized as Hero Street Memorial Park and should continue to be supported by the Town of Silvis at no cost to U.S. taxpayers.
